title: Ultra Performance 3 Pack Mens Open Bottom Sweatpants with Pockets, Casual Sweatpants for Men
description: All-Around Versatility: These lightweight mens sweatpants with pockets are perfect for lounging around the house, taking the dog for a walk, casual hangouts, or even taking a nap. You never know what the day will throw at you, that’s why it feels great to be prepared with clothes like these mens lounge pants with pockets that are ideal in any situation.

Wardrobe Staple: These open bottom workout pants for men are sure to become a wardrobe favorite. These mens sweat pants feature a classic, clean-cut design combined with the expert craftsmanship you've come to expect from Ultra Performance.

Drawstring Waist: When it comes to men’s sweatpants the most important part is mobility. That’s why these athletic pants for men feature an elastic drawstring waistband that contours to your body and won’t hamper your movement by sliding down.

Handy Side Pockets: Men’s apparel shouldn’t only be about style. That’s why Ultra Performance aims to make its mens workout pants practical as well. These mens athletic pants feature 2 side pockets to conveniently carry your phone, keys, or any other small items you need to keep close by.

The Perfect Gift: Ultra Performance’s mens lightweight sweatpants with open bottoms are always a great gift choice for either your dad, husband, son, or friend. Whether it’s for a birthday, anniversary, or Christmas give him a gift he’ll be happy to use every day.
